Storm Williams
COO, Volta Volaré - Manufacturer of fully-electric general aviation aircraft, UAVs, VTOL + autonomous aviation tech.
November 23, 2008, Storm worked with Erik in the same group

Storm is a creative and sharp person. He had excellent ideas as well as a very good taste and has showed both of these characteristics while working as a marketing director at PriceArc. On one occasion, he came up with an idea that our developer called “the most brilliant idea he heard for the project in a long time”He self-committed himself completely to the project and was working long hours towards achieving mutual vision.He is well spoken, has a good sense of humor and showed himself ethically correct at times of difficult decisions. He keeps on his promises and was able to build a trusted and friendly relationship with the rest of the team.He is a team player, on several occasions he went an extra mile to unexpectedly bring in a fresh wave of lofty spirit and motivation to the team members; kept an eye open on latest developments in dot com and Internet arena and always shared interesting things he found out about them with the rest of the team.
